content.content: Hey everyone. We have been working on an EIP that proposes a classification scheme for security weaknesses in Ethereum smart contracts and it be great to get feedback. You can find the draft here https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/1469. Also we are looking for contributors who are interested on working on SWC-registry at https://github.com/SmartContractSecurity/SWC-registry. We have currently 25 smart contract weakness  variants documented and close to 50 test samples on there. The repo is also published on Github Pages https://smartcontractsecurity.github.io/SWC-registry/.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for feedback on their proposal for a classification scheme for security weaknesses in Ethereum smart contracts. They are also looking for contributors to work on the SWC-registry and have provided links to the draft and the repository.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal
